value.title: StarCraft 2: NightMare’s INSANE Tournament Run! (Scarlett vs NightMare)
value.excerpt: NightMare had an amazing StarCraft 2 tournament run at Dreamhack Atlanta. While almost eliminated at the very start of the tournament, he clawed his way through the knockout bracket to ultimately face off against Scarlett in the round-of-16.  Scarlett vs GungFuBanDa: https://youtu.be/0sbXRVPX_ZI  Support
